existing_features.title: Remove the Languages and Notifications settings from the app UI by deleting their entries from the mobile bottom navigation and ensuring the bottom nav layout remains correct after removal (no empty columns or misalignment).
Remove the Languages and Notifications routes so they are no longer accessible within the app navigation (i.e., the router does not register '/languages' or '/notifications').
Add a clearly discoverable '+' button to let users add goals, which navigates to the existing Create Goal flow at route '/create'.

new_feature_requests.summary: Retirer les réglages "langues" et "notifications" de l’application
Ajouter un bouton "+" pour permettre d’ajouter des objectifs

projectName: Remove Languages/Notifications settings and add a '+' goal creation button
